author: Simon Difford
description: This superb drink is better if the shaker and its contents are placed in the refrigerator for several hours prior to mixing with ice. This allows the mint flavours to infuse in the bourbon.
name: Mint Julep Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into julep cup half-filled with crushed ice
CHURN (stir) the drink with the crushed ice using a bar spoon
Top up the cup with more crushed ice and CHURN again
Repeat this process so the drink fills the cup and frost forms on the outside
